description: Create a new Counter functional component that uses the useState hook to manage the counter value state.

step.title: Create Counter component
step.description: Create a new Counter functional component that uses the useState hook to manage the counter value state.

codeRequirements.planContext: Create a simple React functional component that implements a counter with increment, decrement, and reset buttons. The counter value should be styled red when negative and green when positive using CSS modules.
